connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

policy.description:
"description: 
 parameters:
     name:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Policy name
     scap_content_id:
       required: false
       type: number
       description: Policy SCAP content ID
     tailoring_file_profile_id:
       required: false
       type: number
       description: Tailoring file profile ID
     period:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Policy schedule period (weekly, monthly, custom)
     tailoring_file_id:
       required: false
       type: number
       description: Tailoring file ID
     day_of_month:
       required: false
       type: number
       description: Policy schedule day of month (only if period == 'monthly')
     weekday:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Policy schedule weekday (only if period == 'weekly')
     cron_line:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Policy schedule cron line (only if period == 'custom')
     location_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: REPLACE locations with given ids
     scap_content_profile_id:
       required: false
       type: number
       description: Policy SCAP content profile ID
     hostgroup_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: Apply policy to host groups
     organization_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: REPLACE organizations with given ids.
     description:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Policy description
     "

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
